function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Simulated results from occsim are not yet validated","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of crowd behavior model in the simulation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in space occupancy and safety","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning schedules and signage locations based solely on who guidelines, without consideration of simulated contamination frequency.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of virus transmission among building occupants.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suboptimal placement of air cleaners without consideration of simulated data.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of timeline-based representation in the design process leading to inefficient analysis of design options.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in browsing large contact tracing datasets leading to inefficient data analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in parameter certainty levels may lead to distrust in the system and customization with lower confidence.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concerns about the level of randomness in human behaviors in the simulation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider individualized building layouts and ventilation frequencies for disease control","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelming users with too many configurable options","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virtual interviews using zoom due to pandemic lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate validation of simulation accuracy may result in unreliable outcomes and recommendations for safe space design and policy-making.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of interface for customizing contexts","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective occupant behavior customization leading to increased virus transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic human-building interactions facilitate virus transmission and contagion-related behaviors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited flexibility for customizing configurations within the simulation tool","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting to incorporate contextual information in the building model for human behaviour simulation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual and social behaviors in epidemic models and design decisions may lead to ineffective control measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the influence of behavior on the spread of covid-19 may hinder control efforts and re-opening strategies.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simulation of specific scenarios within confined spaces to evaluate transmission risk","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex human behaviors with temporal dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in understanding holistic overview of data","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Stochastic modelling paradigms for simulating occupant behavior","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating agency into virtual humans to evaluate design with multi-occupant scenarios","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate analysis of space occupancy and human behavior","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on already constructed and occupied environments for research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited exploration of how to apply technology in an interactive tool to support facility planning and analysis procedures in the hci community.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential lack of consideration for other human factors in space analysis tools, such as spatial ergonomics, productivity, and social and physical comfort.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Customization of space configurations and occupant behaviors for occupancy simulation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of ability to analyze decisions within the context of relevant human-building interactions and their relationships to potential virus spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social and physical interactions among occupants and the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data collection from a specific location, period, and language may not represent a comprehensive picture of noise complaints and sources.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual identification of noise sources from social media data limits the scalability and accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inconsistency in noise annoyance research results","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased percentage of respondents hearing neighbour noise during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in mean annoyance ratings for certain noise sources during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of neighbour noise annoyance ratings across dwelling types","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased noise complaints across various noise sources","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sleep disturbance due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints during lockdown, particularly due to birds and construction/building works","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise complaints for transport and voice/instrument sources during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased number of noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in tweets with noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparing noise levels before and during lockdown may indicate changes in behavior and activity, impacting disease spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Annoyance caused by noise pollution may lead to stress and weakened immune systems, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of annoyance ratings to percentage of highly annoyed may oversimplify the impact of noise on mental and physical health","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related tweets","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"}]}
